feed.title: Fedify Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fedify: Fedify 1.0.18
entry.content:
Released on February 25, 2025.

  • Added the following default context to Application, Group, Organization, Person, and Service classes:

    json { "Emoji": "http://joinmastodon.org/ns#Emoji" }
